body:
Day 16 - Manga 361*
First of all. Look at the size of that shit. At least three times the size of his hand.
Some faces were pretty good but other than that, there is nothing that really stands out.
4/10.
I mean it was certainly something? I didn't like it very much 4/10

Warning!  Attension! 
Don't read the comments! 
There is a curse in the comments! 

But if you read this comment then the curse is removed from you and curse is broken. 
Good luck.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga
